title: WASM Integration - IOTA Identity SDK
problem: WASM module import/init failures and SSR/webpack conflicts in Next.js when integrating @iota/identity-wasm.
solution_summary: Dynamic import of @iota/identity-wasm/web with init(), enable asyncWebAssembly in Next.js config, add browser fallbacks, and handle errors gracefully.

title: On-Chain Implementation - IOTA Identity
problem: Transition from mock/local demo to real blockchain publishing with DID creation, key storage, wallet integration, and network handling.
solution_summary: Phased framework: complete local DID/key management and network checks; provide publish stub with graceful fallback; defer wallet/alias outputs to later.

title: Transaction Error: toJSON undefined
problem: dApp Kit signAndExecute() expects an SDK transaction object with toJSON(); passing a plain object caused runtime failure.
solution_summary: Skip submission for now; when implementing, use @iota/iota-sdk to build a proper AliasOutput/transaction that implements toJSON, then pass it to signAndExecute().

title: Exhaustive Search: Publishing Not Feasible With Current Stack
problem: API mismatch and unclear docs prevent building a valid transaction object for DID publishing with current versions.
solution_summary: Stay in local mode; plan for wallet SDK or lower-level transaction building and/or community guidance to complete on-chain publishing later.
